name: MFF-NORTH EASTERN REGION CAPITAL CITIES DEVT INVESTMENT PROG-TR2
info: The Program assists the North Eastern states in achieving improved environment and well-being of urban residents in Agartala, Aizawl, Gangtok, Kohima and Shillong. Tranche 2 of the Program continues to support physical improvement of urban infrastructure in water supply systems, sewerage and sanitation systems, and solid waste management in these cities. Tranche 2 will also support the program cities to achieve improved urban governance and financing, municipal financial reform, improved service delivery and improved capacity to manage the Investment Program in Aizawl, Gangtok, and Kohima.
